title: Pixel 1. Can't hear/be heard on calls post Android 10 update (not on Verizon)
content:
Pixel 1 working without issue up until upgrade to Android 10. 
Immediately post upgrade phone unable to make or receive phone calls.
Call will connect but unable to hear person on other end and vice versa.
Same problem whether using default phone app or 3rd party (eg whatsapp).
No other apps installed in past 3 months. 

Seems unlikely to be a hardware issue as the phone works normally immediately after a restart and Iâ€™m able to make a single call. However problem returns within a few minutes. Audio is also working fine with other applications.
  Things I have tried without success:
- Clearing phone cache/data
- Restart in safe mode
- Factory reset
- Disabling google play services permissions for phone

Thank you for your suggestions.
